comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content: Correct spelling Maxine Elliott, American stage actress (1868&ndash1940).

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Maxine Elliott had her own theater in New York City, which bore her name.

She was in St. Moritz when a runaway "bobsleigh" with defective steering gear rammed into three tourists, injuring them severely but not fatally.
